items.title: Sister Midnight Official Trailer
items.description: The official trailer for Sister Midnight released by Magnolia Pictures & Magnet Releasing.

items.title: Henry Cavill's Highlander Reboot Gets A Major Release Update From Director
items.description: After years of planning, Henry Cavill's debut as Connor MacLeod in the new Highlander reboot gets a major release update from director Chad Stahelski.

items.title: Twilight's Imprinting Controversy Explained: Why Jacob & Renesmee's Story Has Aged So Badly
items.description: One of the most controversial parts of The Twilight Saga was when Jacob imprinted on Renesmee as a baby. Here is what imprinting all means.
